comments:
AK (6/12/01 4:55:24 PM)
	i got this exception last night when i was working at home - not connected to the internet
	don't remember what i pressed. 'synchronize with stream' i think. not sure though

there're 2 walkbacks but i guess they're related

NOTES:

JohnA (6/13/2001 9:40:21 AM)
	Looks like he did "Compare With" on a file.  This is the error case that will be 
	fixed in 1GF5W6U: ITPVCM:WIN2000 - NullPointerException in the "compare with version" dialog.
NPE fixed in UI and disconnected workflow now better supported in 2.0.
